name: Invoice Generator Tool
description: A professional invoice generator designed for freelancers, consultants, and small businesses. This tool helps you create clean, tax-compliant invoices with full control over client details, itemized billing, and reusable templates. Export, print, or save your invoices effortlessly—all without needing Excel or accounting software.

sections.title: Custom Client & Item Input
sections.text: Manually enter client information and itemized services or products. Every field is editable, giving you complete control over invoice structure, tax calculations, and additional charges like shipping or discounts.
sections.htmlText: Manually enter client information and itemized services or products. Every field is editable, giving you complete control over invoice structure, tax calculations, and additional charges like shipping or discounts.

sections.title: Professional A4 Formatting
sections.text: Invoices are automatically styled for A4 printing with proper spacing, headings, and branding space. Designed to look professional when sent as PDF or printed directly.

sections.text: Enable or disable tax fields as needed. The invoice generator supports tax-inclusive or tax-exclusive modes, and lets you define GST, VAT, or custom tax types.

sections.text: The built-in smart memory system saves your frequently used data such as client addresses, terms & conditions, and default invoice settings. This eliminates the need to retype common information, speeds up invoice creation, and ensures consistency across all your billing documents.

sections.title: Frequently Asked Questions
sections.text: Address common concerns and guide users through basic usage, features, and limitations.
sections.htmlText:
Is this invoice tool free to use?

Yes! You can generate and print invoices without any hidden charges.

Can I add taxes and discounts?

Absolutely. The tool supports both tax-inclusive and exclusive setups, and allows flat or percentage-based discounts.
